summary: Two New York City girls make a pact to lose their virginity during their first summer out of high school. When they both fall for the same street artist, the friends find their connection tested for the first time.
cast: Dakota Fanning|Elizabeth Olsen|Sterling Jones|Lenny Platt|Boyd Holbrook|Ellen Barkin|Kiernan Shipka|Clare Foley|Roslyn Curry|Clark Gregg|Demi Moore|Richard Dreyfuss|Owen Campbell|Peter Sarsgaard|Brandin Steffesen|James Jenner|Finise Avery|Katelynn Bailey|Mackie Burt|Chris J. Cullen|Alex Galper|Rosemary Howard|Nick Nappy|Kirill Nikiforov
title: Very Good Girls
